title: BRIEF-Heritage Insurance Holdings Q4 Loss Per Share $0.18
text: March 7, 2018 / 11:02 PM / Updated 33 minutes ago BRIEF-Heritage Insurance Holdings Q4 Loss Per Share $0.18 Reuters Staff March 7 (Reuters) - Heritage Insurance Holdings Inc : * HERITAGE INSURANCE HOLDINGS, INC. REPORTS FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 * Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.18 * ‍BOOK VALUE PER SHARE INCREASED 18.2% YEAR-OVER-YEAR TO $14.67 AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2017​ * QTRLY ‍NET PREMIUMS EARNED $ 101.7 MILLION VERSUS $ 94.9 MILLION​ * QTRLY ‍TOTAL REVENUE $ 108.6 MILLION VERSUS $ 102.8 MILLION ​ * ‍GROSS PREMIUMS EARNED WERE $183.3 MILLION FOR Q4 OF 2017 COMPARED TO $160.2 MILLION FOR Q4 OF 2016​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
